channel.title: Please help! how to change default gate way
channel.description: :| hey everyone i have made my server but it is only me that can connect beacuse of my default gate way it changes when i restart my computer i think. i am using talk talk broadband internet dont worry bout the talk talk its something for the phone. i have been on guides and i have been on start>run>cmd and my default gateway changes whenn i reconnect to internet or restart computer. but can some 1 seriously help me?!? iv spent like 3 hours trying to change my gateway to the default 1 . make your intructions easy to understand coz im not very good with computers and tell me what to type. thanks.

item.title: Please help! how to change default gate way
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.source: Please help! how to change default gate way

item.title: Please help! how to change default gate way
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Go to your network connections and right click > properties on the connection you use for the internet. Then you can change it.

Please go to www.moparisthebest.com/smf for more information.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help! how to change default gate way
